description:
Dr. Stein’s mind is deteriorating quickly. As he explores his mental landscape for a way out of the increasing madness, Crona begs Death for a chance to right past wrongs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gira e rigira. Il dottore balla in un nuovo mondo?
Kuru Kuru Kururu: Hakase wa Odoru, Atarashiki Sekai?
Tourne tourne et tourne. Le docteur danse, le nouveau monde ?
Twirl `Round and `Round: A New World in Which the Doc Dances?
クルクルクルル ~博士は踊る, 新しき世界?~
